title: Installation issue: bml (missing python build dependency)
body:
I ran into the following issue when trying to buidl the package bml on a RHEL8 system, with
the build aborting with the error:cd /tmp/spackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-bml-1.3.1-4zhmbw4g3akeml4zndyaqqkdes2zi3qv/spack-build/src/Fortran-interface && /tmp/spackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-bml-1.3.1-4zhmbw4g3akeml4zndyaqqkdes2zi3qv/spack-src/scripts/convert-template -DMATRIX_TYPE=double_complex -DREAL_TYPE="complex(C_DOUBLE_COMPLEX)" -DREAL_KIND=C_DOUBLE_COMPLEX -DREAL_NAME=BML_ELEMENT_COMPLEX -DPRECISION_NAME=BML_PRECISION_DOUBLE_COMPLEX -o bml_utilities_double_complex_m.F90 /tmp/spackswinst/spack-stage/spack-stage-bml-1.3.1-4zhmbw4g3akeml4zndyaqqkdes2zi3qv/spack-src/src/Fortran-interface/bml_utilities_typed_m.F90
/usr/bin/env: 'python': No such file or directory
make[2]: *** [src/Fortran-interface/CMakeFiles/bml-fortran.dir/build.make:69: src/Fortran-interface/bml_utilities_double_real_m.F90] Error 127


Apparently, at some point in the build phase a script 'spack-src/scripts/convert-template'
is called which has a '/usr/bin/env python' shebang.  This worked on our RHEL7 systems,
but on the RHEL8 system I tried there is no 'python' in my path (only 'python2' or 'python3'), so it aborts.  

Although python is a fairly basic utility on Linux systems, and as far as I can see is only being used as build dependency, I suggest adding a python build dependency to bml.
### Steps to reproduce the issue
spack  install bml @1.3.1%gcc@8.4.0 +mpi+shared build_type=Release
...
  >> 289    /usr/bin/env: 'python': No such file or directory
  >> 290    make[2]: *** [src/Fortran-interface/CMakeFiles/bml-fortran.dir/buil
            d.make:77: src/Fortran-interface/bml_utilities_double_complex_m.F90
            ] Error 127

### Information on your system
spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-ivybridge

### Additional information

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5170859/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5170861/spack-build-out.txt)

No maintainers found
